content: **crocheted bag in drops air ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no ai-395 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** diameter approx 12 cm height approx 17 cm **materials** drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50 g colour 18 morning mist crochet hook drops crochet hook size 3 mm drops crochet hook size 4 mm **crochet gauge ** 20 double crochets in width and 22 row in height with hook size 3 mm = 10 x 10 cm 17 double crochets in width and 20 row in height with hook size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
